alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Morgan; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:21AM EST until February 22 at 11:13AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... White River, Eagle Creek, and Eel River. .Melted snowpack combined with rainfall amounts of one to over two inches from Wednesday evening through today falling on frozen ground has caused significant runoff which will produce flooding along area rivers. Along the main stem rivers, flooding could be lengthened and possibly worsened by another storm system next week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River below Eagle Valley Power Plant. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 607.0 feet, Extensive flooding of agricultural lands. Blue Bluff and Paragon Roads are impassable. Flood waters affect a few homes in Waverly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 606.0 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 603.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later today.
